amendment.description: Amendment provides that the National Security Commission shall be paid for with funds appropriated for the Office of the Secretary of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 5 as printed in the Congressional Record) to fund the review commission established in Title III from the funds available to the Secretary of Defense's office, rather than DOD general funds, and to strike the authorization of a specific sum of $1.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 180 (Roll no. 140).
